detail_desc: It seems to be made of nothing more than darkness...
long_desc: A shadow guardian screams a challenge and attacks.

detail_desc: He looks haggard and sickly; no doubt he's been lost here for quite some time.
long_desc: An emaciated adventurer is here looking lost and hopeless.

detail_desc:
Edgar says 'pardon me, can you tell me where to buy cups?'

You see before you, one of Midgaard's finest fighting elite, the mighty
bunny slayer himself, Edgar the Horrible!
long_desc: Edgar the Human Swordpupil is standing here, looking quite lost.

detail_desc: It looks quite strong.
long_desc: A huge diamond golem is standing guard here.

detail_desc:
He seems to be contemplating life, love and the mysteries of the universe.
Then again, he may just have a headache.
long_desc: A young mage wanders about, oblivious to all.

detail_desc: He looks rather harmless, but then again so does a sleeping dragon.
long_desc: Strick is here levitating drinks to his customers.

detail_desc: Tatorious winks at you mischievously.
long_desc: Tatorious the wizard is here counting his earnings.

detail_desc:
She does not look like the typical cook you would find in a kitchen,
but she certainly fits what you would expect in a tower fulls of
mages.
long_desc: Ezmerelda the cook is here stirring a large pot of something.

detail_desc: This young man is busy adding strange ingredients to the large pot.
long_desc: The cook's assistant is here assisting the cook.

detail_desc:
Though his clothes are all in rags, you can see that at one time they
must have been fine garments.  A metal muzzle has been fitted over the
poor wretch's mouth, whether to keep him from screaming, or to silence
his spell casting you cannot tell.

He looks quite mad, no doubt he has been mistreated horribly.
long_desc: A prisoner is chained to the wall here.

detail_desc: He looks rather dirty.
long_desc: The Jailor is here enjoying a comfortable nap.

detail_desc: The broom screams 'Take that you lout!'
long_desc: A straw broom is here leaning against the wall.

detail_desc: The hands twitch with anticipation of strangling someone.
long_desc: A pair of disembodied hands floats in the air here.

detail_desc: The eyes smoulder with hatred.
long_desc: A pair of disembodied eyes floats here glaring at you.

detail_desc: He looks quite sleepy.
long_desc: A visiting mage is here snoring away in peaceful slumber.

detail_desc: She looks quite intent on her studies.
long_desc: A young apprentice magic user is here doing magical studies.

detail_desc: He looks to be oblivious to all but the spell he is memorizing.
long_desc: A young apprentice is here mumbling words of magic to himself.

detail_desc: He seems to be dreaming.
long_desc: A young apprentice is sleeping here.

detail_desc: He looks like a mischievous youth.
long_desc: A young apprentice is here teasing a cornered kitten.

detail_desc:
The little ball of fur looks very unhappy.  Singed fur and a few minor
burns mark its mottled coat.
long_desc: A small kitten is here meowing in terror.

detail_desc: The student yawns.
long_desc: A student of spells is here looking quite bored.

detail_desc: He looks quite angry at your interruption.
long_desc: The instructor screams at your interruption and attacks you.

detail_desc: He blinks in and out of existence, trying to master the spell.
long_desc: A student of spells is here trying to master invisibility.

detail_desc: The teacher is quite fierce and rather frightening.
long_desc: A spell teacher screams at your interruption and attacks.

detail_desc: She looks to have collapsed from sheer boredom.
long_desc: A student of spells has fallen asleep at her desk here.

detail_desc:
This wizzened old man looks like he could easily pass for the oldest
living man.  Of course, having heard stories about some of the magic
available to the people living here, and what toll the magic draws...
this man might be as young as you.
long_desc: An old wizard is here making a speech here.

detail_desc:
This young fellow looks quite confident in his abilities to defend
himself.
long_desc: A young mage is here learning hand to hand combat.

detail_desc:
She looks quite rugged. In fact, she more resembles a warrior than a magic
user.
long_desc: The battle mistress is here teaching the fine uses of a dagger.

detail_desc:
The teacher looks to be worn out by a long day of magic working, difficult
spells, and inattentive students.
long_desc: A spell teacher is here relaxing.

detail_desc:
Dreams of magic and power are probably flowing through his head right
now, better not wake him up.
long_desc: An aged wizard is sleeping here.

detail_desc:
He appears to be copying out some spell ingredients or components right
now.
long_desc: A scribe is here working on some manuscripts.

detail_desc:
She is quite cute.  Too bad her only interest seems to be the words of
lore she is translating.
long_desc: A scribe is here working diligently on some translations.

detail_desc:
He seems to be so old, his skin has become nothing but a giant wrinkle.
The master scribe screams 'How dare you interrupt my important work???'
long_desc: The Master Scribe is here looking a little upset

detail_desc:
You can tell that he isn't trusted with the more important documents,
since those ones are rolled and sealed with wax.
long_desc: The scribe's assistant is here folding parchments.

detail_desc:
The Enchanter is hard at work, concentrating on a spell which could
either destroy the weapon or make it many times more powerful than
it already is.
long_desc: The Enchanter is here placing a dweomer upon well made sword.

detail_desc: It looks quite sharp.
long_desc: A well crafted sword lies on the work table here.

detail_desc:
He looks like he has been quaffing too many potions.  His eyes dart
around wildly, and he starts to drool.

The Mad Alchemist throws back his head and cackles with insane glee!
long_desc: The Mad Alchemist babbles something incomprehensible and attacks.

detail_desc:
The Summoner looks to be hard at work, concentrating on keeping control
over the gateway before he loses his soul to the creatures on the other
side of it.
long_desc: The Master Summoner is here holding gateways open to other planes.

detail_desc: The Master Charmer sizes you up, always looking for a new pet.
long_desc: The Master Charmer utters the words, 'uuuzzldctz'.

detail_desc: He looks flammable.
long_desc: A wooden golem stands a silent vigil here, guarding the stairs.

detail_desc: The Master Spellbinder snarls at you and attacks.
long_desc: The Master Spellbinder is here re-charging a blackened wand.

detail_desc:
The Golem Master appears to be very meticulous about his work, to
the point of fussing over it.
long_desc: The Golem Maker is here chiseling some stone.

detail_desc: It looks like a statue, until you see it shamble towards you.
long_desc: A granite golem stands here waiting to do its master's bidding.

detail_desc: He looks rather dim witted.
long_desc: A bronze golem stands here shining in the light.

detail_desc:
It looks to be made of a potpourri of different body parts; some don't
even resemble anything human.
long_desc: A flesh golem stands guard here

detail_desc: It looks like a bunch of old rags, quite surprising it can actually walk.
long_desc: A cloth golem wanders around here.

detail_desc:
It seems to be forged of dark metal.  It looks strong and durable,
but somewhat un-intelligent.
long_desc: An adamantite golem stands here looking very dangerous.

detail_desc: This large golem almost looks like it is made of dirt.
long_desc: A clay golem stands guard here.

detail_desc:
The image of an ugly dragon flickers slightly, and where the dragon
was now stands a small harmless looking old man.
long_desc: An enormous multi-colored three-headed dragon growls at you.

detail_desc:
Attired all in black, the Necromancer is tall and gangly, but still quite
an imposing figure.  A dark cowl shrouds most of his face, but two blazing
embers which serve as eyes can be seen through the shadow.
The Necromancer shrieks some obscenities and orders his minions to attack.
long_desc: The Necromancer is here raising undead servants.

detail_desc: It feels no pain, and hacks at you ruthlessly.
long_desc: An animated skeleton screams silently and attacks.

detail_desc:
This thing seems to be the reanimated corpse of a giant, creating an
enormous zombie.
long_desc: An undead giant lumbers towards you.

detail_desc:
She has no face at all, just blank skin, rather disturbing.  From about
where her mouth should be, comes a disgusting giggling sound that makes
your skin crawl with revulsion.
long_desc: An ugly witch is here scrying out secrets.

detail_desc: He looks like a rather peaceful old man.
long_desc: The Librarian has fallen asleep at his desk here.

detail_desc:
A powerful wizard in his own right, the apprentice of the master of balance
has given up his station in the mage guild hierarchy in order to serve the
Great Master in hopes of gleaning secrets one could never hope to uncover
alone.
long_desc: The Master's apprentice leaps to halt your passage.

detail_desc:
The grey cat cocks an ear towards you, sensing your scrutiny, then purrs
contentedly.  It looks rather harmless, until you notice its very large
claws.
long_desc: A grey cat is lounging lazily here.

detail_desc: He looks quite peaceful.
long_desc: The Master of Neutrality is here contemplating the balance of the Universe.

detail_desc:
She bears a wicked looking scar down the side of her face, though once
she must have been beautiful, now the scar combined with what seems to
be a permanent scowl make her looks quite fearsome.
long_desc: A black robed apprentice jumps from the shadows and attacks.

detail_desc:
It looks both mean and dangerous.  Petting seems to be completely out of
the question.
long_desc: A black cat with its fur up hisses at you.

detail_desc: The Master glares at you.
long_desc: The Master of the Black Robes is here plotting vile deeds.
short_desc: the Master of the Black Robes

detail_desc:
He looks like a fanatic.
The white robed apprentice screams 'Thou art unworthy of this honour!'
long_desc: A white robed apprentice screams at your desecration of goodness.

detail_desc: It seems to be nothing more than a large ball of fluff with claws.
long_desc: A white cat is here preening its fur.

detail_desc: He looks like a self-righteous bastard.
long_desc: The Master of Goodness is here frowning at your intrusion.

detail_desc:
It looks incredibly large for a cat, no doubt a giant of its species.
A beautiful jewel encrusted collar about its neck is its only adornment.
long_desc: A large calico cat is lounging about here.

detail_desc:
She looks quite comfortable on her emerald throne. Amazingly young and
pretty for one of such stature in the guild, no doubt she has kept her
youthful appearance through the use of strong magics.
The Grand Mistress pets her familiar and smiles at you in confidence.
long_desc: The Grand Mistress of Magic is sitting here.
